# Security Policy

## Supported Versions

| Version | Supported          |
| ------- | ------------------ |
| 1.4.x   | :white_check_mark: |
| < 1.4   | :x:                |

## Reporting a Vulnerability

If you discover a security vulnerability within this project, please send an email to **parkdavid31@gmail.com**. All security vulnerabilities will be promptly addressed.

**Please do not disclose security-related issues publicly until a fix has been released.**

### What to include in your report:
- Description of the vulnerability
- Steps to reproduce the issue
- Potential impact of the vulnerability
- Any suggestions for fixing the vulnerability (optional)

### What to expect:
- Acknowledgment of your report within 48 hours
- Regular updates on the progress of fixing the vulnerability
- Credit in the release notes (unless you prefer to remain anonymous)

## Security Best Practices

This project follows security best practices including:
- Regular dependency updates via Dependabot
- Automated security scanning with Trivy
- Code review requirements for all changes
- No hardcoded secrets or credentials
